articles.description: Tower, seeking government incentives for its plan, is looking to manufacture 65 nanometre and 40 nanometre chips in India, according to the Indian Express
articles.content:
09:07, 11.02.24 
Israel's Tower Semiconductor has submitted a proposal to India's government to build an $8 billion chipmaking facility in the South Asian nation, national daily Indian Express repor… [+1354 chars]

articles.title: Data vacuum an opportunity for time correction in Nifty: Anand James - The Economic Times
articles.description: “But our modest objectives of 22240-22450/550 continue to be in play though, along with an optimistic target of 22800-23000. But any prospects of potential delay in the onset of rate cuts, could jolt the ride, but may not be enough to trigger a collapse per s…
articles.content: Nifty, which has been looking for a directional headway on either side, ended the week 0.33% down with all major news trigger events like Budget, earnings, US Fed and RBI policy meetings behind us. A… [+4164 chars]

articles.title: Will ITC grow at 14-15% if India grows at 6-7%? ITC CMD Sanjiv Puri spells roadmap | ET NOW GLOBAL BUSINESS SUMMIT 2024 - ET Now
articles.description: ET NOW GLOBAL BUSINESS SUMMIT 2024: Sanjiv Puri, the Chairman & Managing Director of ITC, on Saturday, said that the aspiration of the company is that the business should be ahead of the growth of the Indian economy. Speaking at the ET NOW GLOBAL BUSINESS SUM…
